Value:

tm_stru = gmtime(time_val); \
  strftime(time_buf, p3MTIME_SZ, "%b %e, %Y %H:%M:%S", tm_stru);
Macro: MSG_TIME

Description: Set message timestamp string:

  • Mon day, year hh:mm:ss

Parameters:

  • time_buf: String buffer
  • time_val: System time_t value
